title: LFM LATE NIGHT FLEXI
body:
Don't pretend like any of you have to wake up for anything important, you probably sit there jerking off all day anyway.


We don't care if you're trash, we just have a group of 4 and need a fifth to queue flexiqueue.


Any role except support really. We already have one e-girl, we don't need another.


Add me for invites.

replies.body: Dotn you have irl friends lol
